meanings.definition: A unit of electric dipole moment in the centimeter-gram-second system, equal to 10^-18 electrostatic units.
meanings.sent1: She measured the charge in debyes to calculate the electric dipole moment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use debyes to quantify electric dipole moments in their experiments.
meanings.sent3: The tiny alien spaceship had a debyes meter that malfunctioned, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had the electric charm of a thousand debyes, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The concept of debyes may seem small, but its impact is significant in physics.
